QuestData.Title: The Captain's Foot Locker
QuestData.Description:
I don't care what you do, mate. But, if you get caught, you didn't see me.
I wasn't here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the Captain's Chest below decks on the Queen's Reprisal.
QuestData.RewardText: <Amongst the moldering remains of the chest, you find the captain's log. Its pages are partially intact and it contains interesting information about the possible whereabouts of Queen Sylvanas Windrunner, the new warchief of the Horde.>
